verse: Jesus looked up and saw the rich putting their gifts into the offering box,
and he saw a poor widow put in two small copper coins.
And he said, “Truly, I tell you, this poor widow has put in more than all of them.

header: Jesus Foretells Destruction of the Temple

verse: And while some were speaking of the temple, how it was adorned with noble stones and offerings, he said,
And they asked him, “Teacher, when will these things be, and what will be the sign when these things are about to take place?”
And he said, “See that you are not led astray. For many will come in my name, saying, ‘I am he!’ and, ‘The time is at hand!’ Do not go after them.
Then he said to them, “Nation will rise against nation, and kingdom against kingdom.

header: The Coming of the Son of Man
The Lesson of the Fig Tree

verse: And he told them a parable: “Look at the fig tree, and all the trees.
And every day he was teaching in the temple, but at night he went out and lodged on the mount called Olivet.
And early in the morning all the people came to him in the temple to hear him.
